title: Graduated from UC Berkeley
description: Successfully completed Master's degree in Urban Planning with honors from UC Berkeley.
content:
Successfully completed my Master's degree in Urban Planning at UC Berkeley, graduating with honors. My thesis focused on sustainable urban development and the integration of green spaces in metropolitan areas. The research involved extensive analysis of successful urban renewal projects across major cities and their impact on community well-being.

During my time at Berkeley, I had the opportunity to work with leading experts in the field and participate in several groundbreaking projects. This experience has significantly shaped my approach to urban planning and reinforced my commitment to creating sustainable, livable cities.
